title: 820-4924-A Corrosion around smc and rtc area
message:
I’m ordering 2 donor boards for this board that just arrived I tested cpu and It seems normal Reading .15v to ground as I remember from a previous board this should be ok. I uploaded the areas that have corrosion I will replace everything around cpu, rtc and smc. What would advice be as to what else you would replace
And just flux and reflow the rest

title: 820-4924-A Corrosion around smc and rtc area
message: ALWAYS reball SMC, if you note corrosion close to it.
